					<item>

have their exhibition space doubled, courtesy of Epic</description>

				<description>UPDATE: State representative who previously declared legislation a &quot;slippery slope&quot; affirms support for efforts toward regulating loot boxes; expects more states to follow Hawaii's lead</description>

					<item>

					<item>
